ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Setup and retrieve HTTPS and SSH credentials for use with 'git' and other services. For HTTPS remotes the package interfaces the 'git-credential' utility which 'git' uses to store HTTP usernames and passwords. For SSH remotes we provide convenient functions to find or generate appropriate SSH keys. The package both helps the user to setup a local git installation, and also provides a back-end for git/ssh client libraries to authenticate with existing user credentials.

Setup and retrieve HTTPS and SSH credentials for use with 'git' and other services. For HTTPS remotes the package interfaces the 'git-credential' utility which 'git' uses to store HTTP usernames and passwords. For SSH remotes we provide convenient functions to find or generate appropriate SSH keys. The package both helps the user to setup a local git installation, and also provides a back-end for git/ssh client libraries to authenticate with existing user credentials.

name: r-credentials
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-credentials
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/credentials_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/credentials/credentials_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 140043804b4cfcb5e174af3a188ce4cd1e17f7f6aeb777bbd4da21f6c73e013c

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-askpass
    - r-curl
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-openssl >=1.3
    - r-sys >=2.1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-askpass
    - r-curl
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-openssl >=1.3
    - r-sys >=2.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('credentials')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('credentials')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://docs.ropensci.org/credentials (website) https://github.com/r-lib/credentials
  license: MIT
  summary: Setup and retrieve HTTPS and SSH credentials for use with 'git' and other services. For HTTPS remotes the package interfaces the 'git-credential' utility which 'git' uses to store HTTP usernames and passwords. For SSH remotes we provide convenient functions to find or generate appropriate SSH keys. The package
    both helps the user to setup a local git installation, and also provides a back-end for git/ssh client libraries to authenticate with existing user credentials.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: credentials
# Type: Package
# Title: Tools for Managing SSH and Git Credentials
# Version: 1.3.0
# Authors@R: person("Jeroen", "Ooms", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "jeroen@berkeley.edu", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-4035-0289"))
# Description: Setup and retrieve HTTPS and SSH credentials for use with 'git' and other services. For HTTPS remotes the package interfaces the 'git-credential' utility which 'git' uses to store HTTP usernames and passwords. For SSH remotes we provide convenient functions to find or generate appropriate SSH keys. The package both helps the user to setup a local git installation, and also provides a back-end for git/ssh client libraries to authenticate with existing user credentials.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# SystemRequirements: git (optional)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: openssl (>= 1.3), sys (>= 2.1), curl, jsonlite, askpass
# Suggests: testthat, knitr, rmarkdown
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Language: en-US
# URL: https://docs.ropensci.org/credentials (website) https://github.com/r-lib/credentials
# BugReports: https://github.com/r-lib/credentials/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-07-21 08:38:12 UTC; jeroen
# Author: Jeroen Ooms [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4035-0289>)
# Maintainer: Jeroen Ooms <jeroen@berkeley.edu>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-07-21 09:10:06 UTC
